## Lendo likes

```{r}
#| label: carrega-likes

likes <-
  list.files(
    path = "Dados/likes", 
    pattern = "*.rds",
    full.names = TRUE
  ) |> 
  map(
    \(nome) {
      read_rds(nome) |> 
      mutate(
        to_actor = 
          nome |> 
          str_remove("\\..*$") |> 
          str_replace("Dados/likes/", "did:plc:") |> 
          str_remove("-.*$"),
        from_actor = 
          actor_data |> 
          map_chr(\(x) x$did),
        data = created_at,
        .keep = "none"
      )
    }
  ) |> 
  list_rbind()
```
